definition[0]: the skill of doing something at exactly the right time
example[0]: He told jokes with an exquisite sense of timing.
example[1]: He was just walking into the restaurant when we got there. Perfect timing.
definition[1]: the time when someone does something or when something happens, especially when you are considering how suitable this is
example[2]: Ferry schedules and precise timings are subject to weather conditions on the day of departure.
example[3]: The president and I did not discuss the timing of my departure.
definition[2]: the way in which electricity is sent to the spark plugs in a car engine
